website_summaries.verdict: Achieve professional-looking results for the interior of your vehicle without leaving your driveway.
pros: Tough enough to prepare cars of show quality
We love the long reach that cleans the likes of large SUVs and vans
cons: Will not clean the exterior of your vehicle

customer_reviews.title: If the product is exactly what is pictured including the model #
customer_reviews.text: the vacuum we received was not what we ordered. There are significant differences that reflect the performance of the vacuum. My husband is a contractor and he is looking for a specific design/performance that was displayed, however it was not what we received.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strong shop vac
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum cleaner has some real power. I bought it with the car detailing kit and my car is always spotless now...its hard keeping a car clean with 2 toddlers but Ridgid makes it possible.
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: A good product for the money.
customer_reviews.text: We use this for cleaning our vehicles and also for our garage. So far it is superior in all aspects of workability.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Anne Hess

customer_reviews.title: Its a really good vaccum with a cheap hose.
customer_reviews.text: So I was super excited to get this. It arrived, looked beautiful and I was happy. Suction was solid, hose and cord long, plenty of accessories. Then I used it and my first 'go', the hose broke off under the attachment. Im not gonna return it, I just used duct tape. But like the title says, its a great vaccum with a cheap af hose. Be warned.
customer_reviews.author: Austin C

customer_reviews.title: This thing sucks so good.
customer_reviews.text: Quiet for such a powerful shop vacuum. The assortment of attachments covers the need of auto detailing and then some.
customer_reviews.author: matt s

customer_reviews.title: Bad shipping
customer_reviews.text: Shop vac is great but shipping was horrible it came in a box that was destroyed
customer_reviews.author: Brian Hay

customer_reviews.title: Arrives pretty fast
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum works really great and suction power is amazing. I couldn't do a 5 star review because the delivery was to the incorrect house. It was delivered to the wrong address and that person called me and I had to drive and pick it up.
customer_reviews.author: alek$

customer_reviews.title: Nice shop vac
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful. Wished there was a place for the detailing attachments.
customer_reviews.author: dpark

customer_reviews.title: Great package deal
customer_reviews.text: So many extra tools and great power, a winning combo
customer_reviews.author: Moose & Squirrel

customer_reviews.title: So glad I purchased this!
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I received my shop vac, I put it together and cleaned my basement. It worked great and does a wonderful job even along the edge of the floor and around plumbing. I haven't tried the vehicle detailing kit but will soon. Happy customer!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great multi-purpose shop vac.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great out of the box. Assembly was easy and went right to work. The blower assembly kept the workplace clear of dust.,,
customer_reviews.author: DLH

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't be happier! Works like a charm on a multitude of projects.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Poweful suction!
customer_reviews.text: I love this shop vac. It has great suction and easy to move around.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Suoer service
customer_reviews.text: Couldnr believe how quickly the product arrived! Love this shop vac! My mom has one just like it and after borrowing hers, we decided we needed to get our own! Works great!
customer_reviews.author: C. Rice

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gift!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered as a gift for my son-in-law, but he had to tear it away from his wife, who decided it was the perfect tool to clean up after Christmas with! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: darryl moore

customer_reviews.title: This vacuum sucks!  For real though..wink wink
customer_reviews.text: This is great vacuum! I use it for everything from vacuuming my hardwood floors to cleaning my car and even picking up after messy home projects. I love this vac!
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Lee

customer_reviews.title: Keep everything in my house clean. I use it ...
customer_reviews.text: Keep everything in my house clean. I use it wherever I can. Also comes in handy to get the ask out of my Big Green Egg.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Merrell

customer_reviews.title: Great Vacuum!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great Buy!! Love it! Auto detailing kit a bonus!! I did a much better job with my Rigid that paying at the car wash for a 1/2 done job!
customer_reviews.author: Dianaa Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Awesome vaccum.
customer_reviews.text: Best vacuum ever. I use this to vacuum the house, and to vacuum the cars before the car show. Plenty of power, suction is great, and the tools it comes with are top notch.
customer_reviews.author: dwec12

customer_reviews.title: Best vac
customer_reviews.text: Ridged are the best vacuums for the money! Never lose suction.
customer_reviews.author: matt konter

customer_reviews.title: Ratings are for real..
customer_reviews.text: Great suction! Low noise for the power! Massive tank for debris. Love the car detailing attachments (this is my primary use)! Great price for everything you get. Only thing to consider is it’s size, if you are looking for something medium to small, this is not the model for you. It’s big but if you have the space, consider nothing else. Lastly, best warranty out of any other brands period. Lifetime!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bang for the BUCK
customer_reviews.text: Bought it at the Depot for $99. It came with the smaller hose for car cleaning attachments and hose as well as the large hose for the big jobs. I also got the a veteran discount.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Beat one up for a decade. Still going.
customer_reviews.text: It has been REALLY used. It is finally making a little bearing noise. I will replace it. I hope the new one is as good as my old one.
customer_reviews.author: spanky

customer_reviews.title: Original box
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed that it came in its original box. The person that the gift was for came home first.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best shop vac out there. We got this for our wedding and my husband absolutely loves it.
customer_reviews.author: lineco

product_meta.title: RIDGID 14-Gal. 6.0 Peak HP Wet/Dry Vac with Auto Detailing Kit
product_meta.description: This RIDGID 14 Gallon High Performance Wet Dry Vac is designed to deliver powerful suction, large capacity and a rugged construction in a more compact design while still easily handling large job site chores. A 3-layer fine dust filter captures dry wall dust, and easy-maneuvered casters provide 360 degrees of mobility. Add a top handle with a cord wrap, a heavy duty 2-piece drum construction and a large drain and you've got a wet dry vac that will meet the demands of any professional cleaning job. Each wet dry vac provides whisper quiet operation for a more enjoyable use. Comes with various tool attachments and an accessory holder for convenient storage of the vacuum attachments, so that you can get the full cleaning experience.
feature_bullets: Brand New in box. The product ships with all relevant accessories
